text:
I believe that /server-status when using event MPM no longer contains information about connections as 
event MPM has decoupled the workers from the connection. So it is no longer possible, for instance, to 
determine how many connections are in keepalive state. server-status or some other page should give 
information on the connections.
creator: bugs@oneofus.org
chip@force-elite.com
text:
The number of active keep alive connections is not displayed, or available to mod_status.

The number of connections currently being processed is displayed like normal.
